docs.summary: Read and Write carts from Wix Stores, produce cart lifecycle events

params.name: id
params.doc: The requested cart ID to checkout

docs.summary: Get a cart's checkout URL by ID
Returns abandoned carts based on the requested query parameters

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items, before tax

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total calculated discount value, according to order.discount

docs.summary: This might expand and add additional data

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: a break down of the street to number and street name

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street and number) as free text

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, Floor

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: subdivision (usually state or region) code according to ISO 3166-2

docs.summary: Full contact details for an address

members.name: vatId
members.doc: tax info (Currently usable only in Brazil)

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details when this object describes pickup

members.name: shippingAddress
members.doc: Shipment details when this object describes shipment

members.name: deliveryOption
members.doc: Rule title (as given by the store owner)

docs.summary: This webhook is triggered when a customer has completed their checkout. In most cases, an order will be created immediately and an Order Event webhook will also be triggered. In some cases, the payment provider may list the order as "pending" - and the order will not be created until the payment is listed as "approved."

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer (for all line items) after computation of quantity and discount

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Line item's custom text field selections

members.name: productId
members.doc: Line item product ID (optional for POS orders)

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Line item's primary media for preview

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: id
members.doc: Cart ID, generated from customer identity

members.name: status
members.doc: Cart status can be INCOMPLETE, COMPLETE

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT - Weight unit can't be classified, due to an error
  • KG - Kilograms
  • LB - Pounds

Possible values are:
  • INCOMPLETE
  • COMPLETE - This cart was ordered

Possible values are:
  • ADMIN - Customer is the site owner
  • MEMBER - Customer is logged in
  • VISITOR - Customer is not logged in
  • CONTACT - Contact was created for the customer

tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM - Media item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • IMAGE - Image item type

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED - Line item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • PHYSICAL - Physical item type
  • DIGITAL - Digital item type
  • CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM - Custom item price

members.name: filter
members.doc: A filter string, for more information see the intro section

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort string, for more information see the intro section

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset since the beginning of the collection

members.name: customValue
members.doc: Custom json field for any desired data

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items in cart, without shipping and taxes

members.name: formattedTotal
members.doc: Formatted total cart price includes currency symbol

members.name: checkoutUrl
members.doc: Checkout URL - checkout with the abandoned cart details

members.name: totals
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items in cart, not before shipping and taxes

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNRECOGNIZED_TYPE
  • SCHEDULED
  • EMAIL_SENT
  • EMAIL_NOT_SENT
  • NOTIFICATION_SENT
  • TASK_CREATED
  • CUSTOM_ACTIVITY

Possible values are:
  • ADMIN - Customer is the site owner
  • MEMBER - Customer is logged in
  • VISITOR - Customer is not logged in
  • CONTACT - Contact was created for the customer
